name: Prime Technology Drive
implementingAgency: Ministry of Finance & Digital India Corporation
impactResult: Over 850,000 women onboarded to digital banking. 65% used government services for the first time. Female-led businesses increased by 24%.
keyChallenges: Limited smartphone access in rural regions; digital illiteracy.
successStories: Simran Kaur, a student from Patiala, started her own handicraft e-store after receiving financial training under this scheme.

name: Navachar Yojana
impactResult: Only 47 out of 400 planned hubs became operational. Delays due to land issues and lack of state coordination.
keyChallenges: Land acquisition delays; poor inter-agency coordination; low awareness among micro-entrepreneurs.
successStories: Despite overall failure, a cluster in Hubli helped 150 women artisans market their products globally.

name: Shiksha Shakti Abhiyan
impactResult: Enrollment increased by 1.3 million students; dropout rate reduced by 17% in rural districts.
keyChallenges: Shortage of teachers in tribal regions; slow textbook supply.
successStories: Rina, a Class 6 student from Barabanki, became the first in her family to complete primary school and dreams of becoming a teacher.

name: Krishi Udaan Scheme
implementingAgency: Ministry of Civil Aviation & Ministry of Agriculture
impact: Faster market access for perishable produce
impactResult: Only 18% of planned routes used. High logistics cost deterred participation.
keyChallenges: Lack of cold chains at origin points; poor farmer coordination.
successStories: A co-op in Nashik exported mangoes to Dubai under the scheme, increasing income by 30%.

name: Swasthya Suraksha Mission
impact: Better access to primary health services
impactResult: 15,000+ health centers upgraded. Maternal mortality dropped by 8%; immunization rate rose by 22%.
keyChallenges: Health worker shortages; infrastructure backlog in remote areas.
successStories: A mobile clinic in Gaya district now serves over 300 patients weekly in remote villages.

name: Digital Disha Initiative
impactResult: Only 27% completed training. Infrastructure and outreach gaps in tier-2 cities.
keyChallenges: High dropout rate due to lack of internet access and poor content localization.
successStories: An e-learning center in Noida trained 500 underprivileged youth, with 120 securing internships in tech companies.

name: Jal Jeevan Samriddhi
impact: Improved access to clean drinking water
impactResult: 3.2 million homes got piped water. Time spent by women and children fetching water reduced by 45%.
successStories: In Bundi, women’s self-help groups now manage village water infrastructure effectively, ensuring 24/7 clean supply.

name: Yuva Udyami Vikas
implementingAgency: Ministry of Skill Development and Entrepreneurship
impactResult: 1.5 million youth trained; 65% placement success in IT, manufacturing, and logistics sectors.
keyChallenges: Mismatch between local demand and training supply.
successStories: Ravi from Indore launched his own logistics startup after attending the 3-month skill bootcamp under the scheme.

name: Gramin Gati Mission
impactResult: Connected 18,000+ remote villages to main road networks; travel time to schools and health centers reduced by 55%.
successStories: In Koraput, tribal students now walk just 1.5 km to school instead of 8 km, resulting in a 40% increase in attendance.

name: Samriddh Krishi Abhiyan
impact: Improved productivity and income for farmers
impactResult: Average crop yield increased by 22%; farmer incomes grew by ₹12,000 annually on average.
keyChallenges: Pest outbreaks and fertilizer price volatility.
successStories: Farmer co-operatives in Bardhaman adopted drip irrigation and organic farming, doubling their seasonal earnings.
